name: brass
description: Brass is a warm, golden alloy produced by blending Copper with zinc. Praised for its attractive appearance and excellent workability, brass finds extensive use in both decorative applications and practical components.

allomancy.description: Allows {PAWN} to soothe emotions, calming people or manipulating moods.

feruchemy.description: Stores warmth, useful for surviving cold environments or heating up.

store.description: This pawn is storing body heat into a brass metalmind, passively absorbing thermal energy. Their body resists high temperatures and fire damage far better than normal, allowing them to function in burning envbrassments with reduced risk of heatstroke.

tap.description: This pawn is tapping a brass metalmind, releasing stored heat into their body. They become much more vulnerable to high temperatures and fire, and risk heatstroke if not careful â€” but can survive extreme cold with ease.
